title: Smoked trout with watercress purée and chopped egg salad
description: Smoked trout has a more delicate flavour than the ubiquitous smoked salmon, and with these accompaniments makes for a more special starter.The purée can be made the day before and chilled overnight, and the rest takes minutes to put together.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
3 tbsp extra virgin olive oil, or rapeseed oil
3 tsp soured cream, or crème fraîche
6 thin slices toasted soda bread, buttered
½ lemon, cut into 6 wedges, to serve
